synopsis.text:
D'anclaude, a man with a vendetta against Third-Type androids, has sparked a dangerous movement on Mars in the year 2179. These advanced robots, nearly indistinguishable from humans, have been living among the colonized population undetected. Naomi Armitage, a Third-Type android, and her police partner Ross Sylibus, a Chicago cop with a traumatic past involving androids, are tasked with stopping D'anclaude's sinister plans.

As Ross grapples with his prejudices against androids, he finds himself paired with Armitage to investigate a series of murders targeting Third-Type androids. The investigation takes a personal turn when Ross learns that Armitage herself is a Third-Type android. Matters escalate when Ross is critically injured by an android assassin, forcing him to undergo cybernetic enhancements.

Amidst the escalating tension between Earth and Mars, Ross must confront his own biases and decide where his loyalties lie. With Armitage now a wanted android, Ross faces a difficult choice: stand by his partner or succumb to his prejudices. As the threat of war looms and the body count rises, Ross and Armitage must unravel the mystery behind the murders and protect the lives of those caught in the crossfire.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
